welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Stanton, where southern charm meets modern city life! Known for its beautiful parks and lively downtown, we invite you to explore our city and immerse yourself in its unique culture. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Long Beach Municipal Airport serves all commercial flights.

terminals.name: Daugherty Field Terminal
terminals.description: The Daugherty Field Terminal is used for general aviation and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at John Wayne Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Terminal B at John Wayne Airport primarily serves domestic flights for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 2 hours per day.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Torrance Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private flights and charters.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic flights for Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic flights for American Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic and international flights for Delta Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 6
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic and international flights for Alaska Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic and international flights for United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic and international flights for United Airlines.

terminals.name: Tom Bradley International Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all international flights and some domestic flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout all terminals.
